call_title: Sigma Trees | Alex Chepurnoy | Ergoversary Summit 2024

commitments.commitment: Version 6.0 activation could take place in late 2024 in case of miner support
commitments.quote: the activation could take place in late 2024 in case of miner support

open_questions.question: What exactly to deliver in blockchain context and what can be efficiently delivered
What computations to do on top of blockchain context to allow for a variety of applications
Who will run the executing engine on layer 2s and what's the trust model
open_questions.context: Discussion of enhanced layer 2 systems with Sigma trees

open_questions.question: What could be an execution context in a digital smart cash environment
open_questions.context: Discussion of non-blockchain systems using Sigma trees

key_facts.fact: First design and initial version of interpreter was done in late 2016, early 2017
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: 5.0 release with JIT costing happened in late 2022
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Version 6.0 is in development stage with fixes and more functions
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Formal verification of the first contract was done just three months after mainnet launch
key_facts.speaker: kushti
